column4: Does anyone know of a program that searches for songs online that isn't P2P based?
haven't used songbird yet, but youtorrent.com is good for torrents, and then your favorite deluge, ktorrent, rtorrent, or whatever can take over from there...
if you're looking for something that comes up with playlists to "similar artists" of the ones you tell it you like... pandora.com and last.fm provide that same type of service
